item.description: DP-900 #Azure #cloud #dataanalytics #datawarehousing Azure exam prep Core Data related Azure Services Azure Storage Explorer (To explore Azure Storage accounts) Azure Synapse Analytics Azure Data Lake Storage Azure Data Analytics Azure Data Box Azure Databricks (Apache spark 3rd party) Microsoft Power BI (Dashboards) HDInsight (fully managed Hadoop) Azure Data Studio (IDE like VSCode for data related tasks similar to SSIS) Azure Data Factory (ETL/ELT pipeline builder) SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS) Azure Data Roles Data Engineer Tools Data Overview Data Basically Information
